reviews.text: I had such a great experience with Greth. she‚Äôs very attentive and welcoming. Definitely makes the place better.
Incredible food
Excellent all around! Ron was an excellent waiter and was super friendly and attentive!
Great meal‚Äîthe salmon was delicious.  And Spencer was great‚Äîsuper friendly and efficient.
Loved the food and the service. Spencer was amazing
Spencer was attentive and cool on top of that.

Ron especially did a wonderful job.
Alert, timely and friendly.
Spencer is THE BEST.
Had such a good meal - our server Spencer was great!
Spencer was everything!!
Spencer was the absolute best!! He was so accommodating and helpful with recommendations - 11/10 server!!
Great mezze! Great service! Great atmosphere! Highly recommend.
Delicious food. Fair prices. Courteous service

I randomly found Dagon while walking down Broadway and decided to give it a try. I ordered the three mezze plate, and the bread it came with was incredibly fresh‚Äîa must for dipping.

I chose the marinated beets, the matbucha, and feta. All of them were excellent, but the beets really stood out; the horseradish yogurt was a fantastic touch and paired with the roasted chickpeas it elevated the whole dish.

Finished with the panna cotta which if you're a fan of rose water, you will love it. Overall, a great find and a fantastic meal!
Delaney was wonderful! Food is great! Will come back for sure.
Mackenzie was great
Mackenzie was our server and he was great!!
Spencer was amazing!
Spencer was great!
Spencer was amazing!!
Spencer was the best!
McKenzie was great
Our server Spencer was very hospitable and gracious.
Our server Mackenzie was super friendly and attentive and the food was absolutely delicious. I will definitely be returning!
McKenzie was great
Great service from McKenzie, amazing breads and dips.
McKinsey was our waiter and he was professional, attentive, informative and courteous.  The food was delicious and abundant.  This was our first time eating here and we will definitely be back.
Our server, Ron, was great!
Ron was great!
Ronald is amazing!!!
Food was spectacular. Our server, Spencer, was everything you want in a server, he was truly fantastic! Thank you for such a great dinner!
The food was amazing! Spencer was such a nice guy made us laugh and gave great suggestions üíï we‚Äôll be coming back!
Food was fantastic. Service was wonderful. Our server, Spencer, was phenomenal and so attentive. Will be back for sure.
Excellent service by Delaney. We loved her so much!!!
Spencer was top notch! Amazing food, amazing service and amazing environment. 10/10 recommend.
Excellent!!!  The food and service was above Excellent thanks to my waiter Ron who is absolutely excellent.  My first and most superb experience...thank you Ron
We love Ron.  He was very attentive and the food was fantastic.
The Silan halva dessert is superb! Great food from start to finish. Kudos to Ron our server who kept the mimosa flowing!
Family had an amazing time. Food was so delicious. Our server Kevin was fantastic.
Everything was amazing.
Spencer was super friendly and awesome!  I very much enjoyed the food, the conversation, and vibe!  Will definitely come back!
Spencer was great!
Spencer is the best ever!!
Waiter Ron was a pleasure. Very enjoyable evening

The food was delicious- flavorful, fresh and plenty of choices for vegetarians.
Our server, Spencer, was friendly, informative and attentive.
A great date night!
Delicious food and impeccable service. Spencer was amazing!
Hanger steak skewers - very rare and very delicious
Mejda was our server and she was amazing! Very sweet and outgoing, took great care of us on a date night.
Incredible. And Kevin is the best!!! ‚ù§Ô∏èüá®üá±
Excellent dinner here! The food was unmatched in flavor, breads were soft and delicious, soup was hearty and the best veggie risotto I have ever had. The highlight was the dessert - Silan.

The ambience was excellent. Not too loud. Beautiful lighting. Amazing bartender- we didn't have a particular drink in mind but she managed to whip up something amazing based on what we shared about our usual likes. The crispy lamb was AMAZING. What else can I say? We will be back.

Great experience!
We had a fantastic time at this restaurant. The food was fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. Every dish we tried was delicious.
The service was outstanding, friendly, attentive, and professional.
Highly recommended! I‚Äôll definitely be coming back.

I recently dined at Dagon restaurant and had a mixed experience. The ambiance was fantastic, creating a welcoming experience. Service was equally friendly, attentive, and professional throughout the meal.

Unfortunately, the chicken schnitzel fell short, with a rubbery texture that made it less enjoyable and the salad was overly salty. On a positive note, the bread was absolutely amazing and fresh, flavorful, and a highlight of the meal.

Overall, while there were some hits and misses with the food, the great service and ambiance make it a place I‚Äôd consider giving another try.

My family and I came here for dinner and we decided to sit outside to enjoy the fresh air and natural light. We really appreciated our service from our waiter and the other staff. We got everything we needed and more. We enjoyed our food and drinks and hope to return!

We happened to stop by and wanted to continue our conversation and grab coffee as well as dessert. We had a very attentive waiter the service was excellent. We ordered several cappuccinos, espresso and the Espeesso Martini with the Shinla and cheesecake. Our favorite was the Shinla which was excellent. Next time we will stop by and have a full meal. We truly enjoyed the atmosphere and food.

Our first visit to Dagon was far more than we expected! The atmosphere was relaxing and enjoyable. The attention to detail by our server was incredible. We enjoyed some incredibly unique cocktails. The food was some of the best we‚Äôve enjoyed in NY!

The manager, Frank, went above and beyond when I mentioned that it was my wife‚Äôs birthday. He provided us one of the most delicious, flourless chocolat√© torts we‚Äôve had and wanted to make sure that we knew how much he appreciated our patronage.

Thank you, Frank, and everyone at Dagon, for helping to make our visit to NY truly memorable!

Excellent food and limonada, the space is very nice and open kitchen is huge. Lots of outdoor tables. 3 Mezze with Eggplant, Labneh and Beets was so good! Chicken Shnitz was perfect. And hummus was super fresh. Highly recommend!
Great atmosphere to meet up with friends.  Chill and great for brunch.   The food portions are large and filling.   Great bread and mezze.

Overall good experience. The food tastes great and they have a good variety of dishes. However, the dishes are a bit overpriced for the quantity. The hummus, the fish and the lamb were relatively small and not especially filling. The dessert was of good size but a bit too sweet. The atmosphere is great they put Israeli music.

Well known for the charred lamb neck(really burnt at places), the menu here offers high end mediterranean fare. The place was packed and a bit too noisy for my taste. Good service and nice wine and dessert selection.
The food quality doesn't match expectations of a high rating the restaurant enjoys.  Thr service was ok.  Quick.  We had 7 dishes, and while only 1 was sub-par, the rest remarkably mediocre.

Dinner at Dagon was one of my favorite dining experiences as of late.
(Speaking of late) my friend ran 30 minutes behind for our reservation and the staff still treated me very kindly as I waited at the bar for her.
To eat, I started with the Caesar salad and it might have been one of the best I‚Äôve ever had. Then my friend and I split the roasted beets, eggplant, and green tahina. Everything was outstanding.
Every aspect of this restaurant feels well thought out from the decor to the menu to the service provided.
Dagon is a wonderful dinner option for Mediterranean food a seductive setting.
Our waiter shemul was the best. He answered our questions very insightfully and gave amazing recommendations that we went with and loved. He timed our food out perfectly and was very hospitable.
The entrees were amazing. Guacamole, Green Tehina, eggplant.  All great. Israeli salad also great. The main course were fine , salmon was very tasty and the Daurade fish with asparagus even better.
Very nice for a efficient and delicate brunch, very delicious. Their drinks really has a distinct flavor, very nice and refreshing.
Such a great mid walk stop by in the neighborhood! Mackenzie was great and we‚Äôll be back! Bonus points for the beautiful crudite and great n/a spritz (not pictured)

Dragon is an awesome UWS spot!! We came here for brunch and were not disappointed! They have great food, bottomless mimosas, and our server Irem C took great care of us. My husband has an egg allergy and she accommodated us very nicely. Will come back to Dragon! Highly recommend the shakshuka and Mezze options. The bread is amazing.

There is a place on upper Broadway
That is sure to make special a Mother‚Äôs Day
With mouth-watering delicacies for Sunday Brunch
Or tasty plates for Father‚Äôs Day Lunch
They work their magic with Mediterranean spreads
That stand up beautifully to flat or chubanos breads
And eggs over easy or sunny side up
Sip mimosas bubbling in a fluted cup
And watch the world strolling by their sidewalk cafe
Coming to Dagon is a great way to start the day!

Love this place!! Have tried many things off the menu and everything is DELICIOUS. Great atmosphere and everyone is soo nice. Ron has been our server here many times and is always great. Love Dagon!

P.S. I hope they bring the dill frittata back üòä
Brunch was fabulous and Mackenzie made our experience 10/10! The food was delicious. Would definitely come back!

This is a special, lovely place. The food is as beautiful as it is delicious. is it a problem when you hesitate to disturb the garnishes on a Bloody Mary? (No. It is not.)Loved our waitress Delaney, who spoiled us with little extras, even though we were a motley trio with a restless dog.

The food was amazing. I am celiac and Spencer explained to me all the gluten free options that I had. He was very knowledgeable about all the dishes that contains gluten and he gave me a lot security. Thank you so much Spencer, you are the best!
McKenzie is amazing (and the food‚Äôs good too! Thanks for a wonderful meal - one of our favorite places!

Their friendly and attentive staff made our dining experience here really pleasant, with excellent service throughout.

The Mediterranean dishes - mezze, chicken sofrito, and arayes, were full of flavor and beautifully prepared, though the cheesecake dessert fell a little short.

Having visited before for brunch, the dinner menu stood out as significantly better.
It was a very pleasant experience overall
We love this place! The food is always on point and service is great, Mackenzie is a good vibe and welcoming. Best tuna sandwich in the city! Sounds simple but delicious
Best Middle Eastern food I had in a long time. And quite possibly the best Cesar Salad I ever had. Simply outstanding!

My family and I went to the Dagon restaurant last evening. We ordered the crispy roasted lamb, steak skewer, penne pasta, and Kubaneh dishes. Each dish was flavorful and well cooked. The service was great and the outside seating on a warm fall night provided an excellent backdrop to spend quality time with the family. I highly recommend going to Dagon.

Spencer was an amazing host! He kept the drinks and food flowing and took very good care of us. Will come back for the service definitely. It also helps that every dish we ordered was great and the margaritas hit the spot as well
Had a wonderful lunch here. The food was delicious and Spencer was personable. Will dine here again

Spencer was an incredible server and made our first time here a good one! We loved the food and atmosphere!! The med margarita was awesome and the spicy feta dip was our favorite. Get the sassy chicken! Thanks Spencer for your recommendations!

Erin and Andy

My wife and I live across the street and we just are here for the 1st time. This is our new favorite restaurant!!!!!! We ate Mezze, shish, salad, and lamb. Everything was incredibly delicious!  Mackenzie was our waiter - he was great and he‚Äôs really funny too!  He could be a stand-up comic. He made the entire experience completely enjoyable. WE WILL BE BACK!!!!!

I was there yesterday for my Birthday. Our server was Leo, WONDERFUL guy. Got there @5pm reservations are recommended:) highly recommend the Lamb , Salmon, the hummus, bread a must, Brussels, and so much more.
This place gets more than a 5 star! It‚Äôs a 10/10 for me. The decoration is super nice & romantic when the candles are on!!!

Really delicious food! All of it was so good.
The restaurant was nicely populated - not too busy for a Friday at lunch. Sat at the bar and had great service.

The decoration is nice - the ingredients are fresh. My friend for a burger which had an excessive amount of sauce but other than that proportions were really solid.

Kudos for the color scheme too :)

Discovered this hidden gem when looking for a good martini - and have continued to be impressed through dinner and brunch! Ron was great during brunch, super attentive and refilling our mimosas for a true bottomless experience. Will be back!!
Great food! I was in a lot of places in ny this one is one of the best food and service I got. I don‚Äôt know what Israeli do with food but they have magic when they making food!

Fantastic fish special that tasted bright and simple like eating directly from the Mediterranean Sea. The kebabs were fantastic.  Service was very attentive and the servers were professional, personable, and responsive. In a neighborhood of Mediterranean restaurants, Dagon is an UWS cornerstone. Don‚Äôt miss it.

We came to Dagon for our friends birthday and Spencer L. made the entire night an extremely special occasion. Service was amazing, attentive and so friendly. Recommendations from Spencer were exactly what we needed and wanted, and made the meal well rounded and delicious. We can‚Äôt wait to come back!

Had an amazing dinner. The dishes are so so creative. We had a large group that split the mezze sampler, kubaneh (so good), octopus (fine, but the rice cake is really spicy), cigar, shishbarak (my actual favorite), brisket, sabich flatbread, silan halva dessert (really good but really sweet), and the cheesecake. Looking forward to coming back for Brunch.

My first time dining at Dagon and they made me feel like I was a regular. My plan was to eat at the bar, the hostess greeted me and seated me right away.   Dagon has a casual vibe with a sophisticated atmosphere.  The bartenders were both incredibly attentive but Delaney was the one who handled the majority of my ordering and she was fantastic. Dagon has extended the restaurant week menu which was a bonus. The Israeli/Mediterranean menu has so many options. If you are on the UWS or not Dagon is well worth a visit. Also a fantastic wine and drinks list. I am looking forward to my next visit and explore the regular menu.

Came here for brunch on a Saturday, 12:15, with three others. The food was incredible. Ordered the Kubaneh as our appetizer, and I had the French toast for my main course. So good. Highly recommend. Our server, Ron, was incredible. Super attentive, was able to answer our questions, and was spot on with portion size for plate sharing in my party. Would definitely eat here again.

Just stumbled upon this place wandering the UWS. The service was fast and super friendly, and the food was light, healthy, and delicious. They brought our golden retriever a bowl of water for our pleasant outdoor half booth. Lovely experience! We had the kubaneh, eggplant mezze, Israeli salad, and the flatbread. The chamomile tea and Bloody Mary were also on point!
Great brunch place. Very good mezze, shakshuka. Shah was a great server.

The service was great. The right amount of attention, wiped the table, filled water regularly. The food was delicious. Interesting flavors. The lamb cut like butter, shnitzel was right amount of crispy and not dry, the burger was tops. Great appetizers: hummus, cauliflower flash fried, etc.

This is hands-down one of my favorite restaurants in NYC. It‚Äôs Israeli food done perfectly. It‚Äôs aesthetically beautiful, clean, and the wait staff is very professional and provide top-notch service. The brunch is excellent, and the dinner is too. I always take people from
Out of town here to impress, and it always does! Definitely go.

Make sure you get the cold brew! It‚Äôs amazing!

5 stars all the way but extra kudos to the fantastic service from our bartender who encompasses all the elements that makes this place a second home.. Delaney was personable, kind, and went the extra mile for us. She made a really great old fashioned and most of all...she made us feel welcome. Thank you! We'll be back.

My first time at Dogan and I cannot wait to be back. Spencer gave us great recommendations (we took all of them) and enjoyed our meal thoroughly! Cocktails, wine, food, and dessert ‚Äî can‚Äôt recommend enough.
Great service and great atmosphere. Shemul was a great waiter with helpful recommendations! Food was good
